text:
League 1
PSG: the CUP is serene for the future
Tense tensions Thursday night in front of the capital club. Smoke in hand Collective Ultras Paris (CUP), a group of supporters of Paris Saint Germain was in opposition against the club because of certain events.
01 Nov 2019, 12:20 by Nils Constant



The way PSG manages its supporters displeases many CUP members and they have raised their voices to make their voices heard. On strike on Wednesday, the day before the meeting, the supporters decided to boycott the matches to scream scandal and send a strong message to the leaders.




Event of the group




Paris Saint Germain + 15 ğŸ“·Credit Photo - Icon Sport

The Parisian club finally agreed to meet Thursday night four members of the collective and their lawyer to find a middle ground between them after a demonstration of the group who sang loud and clear "Paris is We" in front of their office. They consider that they have been the target of the park's security company and that this should not happen again. Moving to Dijon this Friday, PSG will not see the CUP in the stands but can count on other Paris fans.

The CUP came out of the meeting and is serene for the future hoping that there will be no slippage.
